alert.note: Alert for Morgan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 05 at 8:06PM CST until March 05 at 8:45PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Morgan County in central Missouri... * Until 845 PM CST. * At 806 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Otterville to near Stover, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Versailles... Stover... Syracuse... Florence... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
